triage_infrastructure.title: Priority Systems
triage_infrastructure.description: The emergency council maps out critical infrastructure: 'Medical facilities, food distribution, communication networks, and transport hubs get priority power,' Maya decides. 'Everything else goes on rolling schedules. It's not fair, but it keeps the archipelago functioning. The question is - what if they target our priority systems next?'

choices.text: 'We need maximum security around priority systems.'
'Can we create decoy priority targets to confuse saboteurs?'
'This triage approach might help other crisis response teams.'
'I should report these vulnerabilities to central command.'
